page.title: 11INSIDE GOLDHANGER SCHOOL
page.content: When the school was a school there were two classrooms.In the classrooms they had high windows so the children could not look out. They had metal bars in the classrooms that hung from the ceiling.On the metal bars there was a little hook where gas lights hung. As the school is now used as an outdoor education field study centre the classrooms have different uses today.One of the classrooms is used for students to sleep in.They sleep in bunkbeds.The other classroom is used for students to work in.They have got a kitchen which they don't use because they have got a new building which has got a kitchen and a diningroom in. There are toilets which are still used as toilets.There is an office which is now used as a cloakroom.
